outline.title: PREPOST: SOTA Transformation & Standalone Architecture
outline.summary: Introduction to the transformation of PrePost into a production-ready, standalone AI platform.

outline.title: Project Overview: AI-Powered Protection
outline.summary: PrePost protects professionals from career-damaging posts using real-time AI analysis.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/QLXo8bAMVNVo.jpg - The slide describes an AI-powered platform for analysis. Image 7 is a clear, professional graphic representing AI and data analysis, which fits the content perfectly.

outline.title: The Challenge: External Dependencies
outline.summary: The original architecture relied on complex external services, increasing costs and deployment time.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/9Tt9e2MeVVFY.png - The slide discusses the original architecture problems, which relied on external services. Image 1 is a detailed architecture diagram showing multiple layers and external services, which visually represents the complexity being discussed.

outline.title: The Solution: Standalone Architecture
outline.summary: A new architecture running entirely on local infrastructure with zero external service dependencies.

outline.title: Core Tech: Local Database & Persistence
outline.summary: File-based JSON database provides zero-setup persistence with full CRUD operations and atomic writes.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/83GwvK0lehK5.png - The slide describes the new standalone architecture, which is still a complex system with an API layer, load balancer (implied by API routes), and data layer. Image 3 is a clean, modern architecture diagram that can represent the new, simplified structure.

outline.title: Core Tech: Built-in Auth & Security
outline.summary: Enterprise-grade PBKDF2 authentication and OWASP Top 10 2025 compliance without external providers.

outline.title: Core Tech: Enhanced AI & Validation
outline.summary: Sophisticated Claude 3.5 integration with type-safe Zod validation and intelligent fallback mechanisms.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/T9cJTZ4GkhBv.jpg - The slide discusses enterprise-grade authentication and security specifications (PBKDF2, 100,000 iterations). Image 5 is a high-quality security shield graphic with a digital/tech background, which is highly relevant to the topic of secure authentication.

outline.title: Performance: Speed & Optimization
outline.summary: Achieving 92/100 performance score with sub-2-second load times and effective rate limiting.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/Liuc5a861baI.png - The slide focuses on enhanced AI integration and analysis categories. Image 8 shows a tree diagram illustrating different types of AI, including 'Analytic AI' and 'Text AI', which directly relates to the content analysis function.

outline.title: Deployment: One-Command on Manus
outline.summary: Simplified deployment process requiring only one API key and less than 5 minutes to start.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/8NeZB2nsK69x.jpg - The slide details achieving OWASP Top 10 compliance and systematic security hardening. Image 4 is a dynamic, high-tech security shield graphic, symbolizing the defense-in-depth approach and compliance.

outline.title: Impact: Cost Reduction & Metrics
outline.summary: Eliminating fixed costs and achieving significant improvements in security, performance, and efficiency.

outline.title: SOTA Compliance: 95/100 Score
outline.summary: Achieving production-ready quality across architecture, security, code quality, and documentation.

outline.title: Documentation: Comprehensive Guides
outline.summary: Over 30,000 words of professional documentation covering deployment, architecture, and API specs.

outline.title: Roadmap: Future Enhancements
outline.summary: A clear path from MVP to enterprise-scale platform with planned testing and feature expansions.

outline.title: Conclusion: Production Ready
outline.summary: PrePost is now a fully autonomous, SOTA-compliant platform ready for immediate deployment.
